[Groovy] Class JsonUtil

    • Few JSON functions required for diff application

      • Method Detail

        • protected static java.util.List _help(java.lang.String[] pathNodes, java.lang.Object structure)

        • static java.lang.String printMap(java.util.Map source)

          Simple alias for groovy.json.JsonOutput#prettyPrint(String jsonPayload) function

          Returns:
          java.lang.String pretty print of JSON object
          Parameters:
          source - java.util.Map JSON object or java.util.Map that will be transformed into java.lang.String

        • static java.util.List walkJsonByPath(java.lang.String listPath, java.lang.Object structure)

          Searches inside of JSON object for element (another JSON object) that has key equal to element in listPath.
          When last element in listPath reached, returns all elements that match specified Path.

          Returns:
          java.util.List of JSON objects located in structure under listPath path
          Parameters:
          listPath - Node (or key) names separated with '.' for 'walking' im depth of JSON object in structure
          structure - JSON object OR java.util.List of JSON objects that will be transformed and returned
